title: Vengeance by AJ Scudiere
description: How would you react if the mafia took out your entire family? Cynthia Beller came up fighting. Years of training have made her the mafia's worst nightmare, but there is another who is out for Vengeance too and an FBI agent close on her heals.Find out what is "right" and what is "justified" in AJ Scudiere's VENGEANCE.
author: A.J. Scudiere
